query: SELECT ID, MUID, VersionName, VersionNumber, Version_ID, VersionFlag, Name, Code, ChangeTrackingMask, [Company Name_Code] as Company_Name_Code, [Company Name_Name] as Company_Name_Name, [Company Name_ID] as Company_Name_ID, [Customer ID] as Customer_ID, [Legal Number Original] as Legal_Number_Original, [Country Code_Code] as Country_Code_Code, [Country Code_Name] as Country_Code_Name, [Country Code_ID] as Country_Code_ID, Address, [ZIP Code] as ZIPCode, City, [Industry Type_Code] as Industry_Type_Code, [Industry Type_Name] as Industry_Type_Name, [Industry Type_ID] as Industry_Type_ID, EnterDateTime, EnterUserName, EnterVersionNumber, LastChgDateTime, LastChgUserName, LastChgVersionNumber, ValidationStatus FROM mdm.[Customer To Map]
